headline: Is Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Strength And Sector Focus
summary: Wondering if Citizens Financial Group at around US$59.93 offers good value, or if the recent run puts it in the pricey camp? This article walks through what the numbers actually say about the stock. The share price has seen a 1.7% decline over the last 7 days, a 2.5% gain over 30 days, and is showing returns of 0.9% year to date, 32.2% over 1 year, 68.1% over 3 years, and 84.9% over 5 years. These shifts can change how the market reads both risk and opportunity. Recent coverage around...
